question: السلام عليكم يا شباب تسجيل المواد متى يبدا؟
answer: 12 & 13 October

topic: Safety Pass Course for Lab Access
question: بالنسبة للسيفتي باس هل لها تأريخ إنتهاء و بعدها لازم تعمل اختبار من جديد؟
answer: You will have two options to join the safety pass course. -First, it is under FKM through elearning. You have to watch videos (asynchronous class) in elearning ( within 7 days) and the test is in the elearning. -Second is under Professional Skill Certificate (PSC) by UTM ileague. It is through online webex (synchronous class) in which you have to register the class under PSC courses (elective course). The first PSC class will be held on 21 and 22 October. it is two day class. You will get exemption from safety pass course through elearning. The test is also in elearning. If you join either one, you can take the test. If you choose second option, you need to register yourself in a google form which will be provided in safety pass website (however, the link is still not ready yet). However, i suggest you to choose option 1...watching the videos in elearning. You need to make it earlier as you will have your first experiment in lab in second week.
